protein.specific_function: Bifunctional enzyme that converts glutamate to glutamate 5-semialdehyde, an intermediate in the biosynthesis of proline, ornithine and arginine.

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, carboxyl group as acceptor
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the aldehyde or oxo group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the aldehyde or oxo group of donors, nad or nadp as acceptor
glutamine family amino acid metabolic process
cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process

reference.reference_text: Aral B, Schlenzig JS, Liu G, Kamoun P: Database cloning human delta 1-pyrroline-5-carboxylate synthetase (P5CS) cDNA: a bifunctional enzyme catalyzing the first 2 steps in proline biosynthesis. C R Acad Sci III. 1996 Mar;319(3):171-8.
